content.query:
Use Test
GO
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='New@Password1'




CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL dldDemoAccountCredential
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET='sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2022-12-14T18:58:30Z&st=2022-12-08T10:58:30Z&spr=https&sig=DuSxN9UI7JexTxxQKXLk9ftIKtPCwH8AgNsxFR0WA3g%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE newdatasource with(
    LOCATION='https://dldemoaccount.queue.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL=dldDemoAccountCredential
);
